# [Book Title: ]{.screen-reader-text}Exploring Physical Phenomena {#book-title-exploring-physical-phenomena .section__title .book-header__title}

[Subtitle: ]{.screen-reader-text}What happens when light from the Sun
shines on the Earth?

[Authors: ]{.screen-reader-text}Emily van Zee and Elizabeth Gire

::: {.book-header__cover}
::: {.book-header__cover__image}
![Cover image for Exploring Physical
Phenomena](../app/uploads/sites/12/2020/03/Title-Page_ExploringPhysicalPhynomena-scaled.jpg){.attachment-333x500
.size-333x500 width="333" height="431"
sizes="(max-width: 333px) 100vw, 333px"
srcset="../app/uploads/sites/12/2020/03/Title-Page_ExploringPhysicalPhynomena-scaled.jpg 1978w, ../app/uploads/sites/12/2020/03/Title-Page_ExploringPhysicalPhynomena-232x300.jpg 232w, ../app/uploads/sites/12/2020/03/Title-Page_ExploringPhysicalPhynomena-791x1024.jpg 791w, ../app/uploads/sites/12/2020/03/Title-Page_ExploringPhysicalPhynomena-768x994.jpg 768w, ../app/uploads/sites/12/2020/03/Title-Page_ExploringPhysicalPhynomena-1187x1536.jpg 1187w, ../app/uploads/sites/12/2020/03/Title-Page_ExploringPhysicalPhynomena-1583x2048.jpg 1583w, ../app/uploads/sites/12/2020/03/Title-Page_ExploringPhysicalPhynomena-65x84.jpg 65w, ../app/uploads/sites/12/2020/03/Title-Page_ExploringPhysicalPhynomena-225x291.jpg 225w, ../app/uploads/sites/12/2020/03/Title-Page_ExploringPhysicalPhynomena-350x453.jpg 350w"}
:::
